attributes.action: Lift the ban on American XL bully or ensure the resignation of the government
attributes.additional_details: Britain has been a progressive example to the world for centuries. That is why we insist on the need for the resignation of the Prime Minister and the Government who have allowed the disregard for the universal values that underpin British democracy.
attributes.background: We, the citizens of the United Kingdom, demand the lifting of restrictions on American XL bully. Or the resignation of a government whose actions have left a stain on our country's reputation.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for the removal of the Government.
